products.name: Smart Thermostat
products.description: Reduce your energy bills and control your home's temperature with this smart thermostat.

products.name: Smart Room Sensor
products.description: This smart room sensor works with your smart thermostat to adjust the temperature based on the room's occupancy and temperature.

products.name: Smart Heating Panel
products.description: This smart heating panel can be controlled with your voice or phone, and features a sleek and modern design.

products.name: Smart Air Conditioner
products.description: Control your air conditioner with your voice or phone and set schedules to save energy with this smart air conditioner.
